columns.headline: Combining world-class capabilities with a local practice model
columns.body:
Long-term consultant employees with deep business acumen and leadership abilities Providing more experienced consultants & leading methods/techniques/tools to:
  • Accelerate results and productivity
  • Provide greater team continuity
    • More sustainable/cost effective pricepoint.

Collaborative

Co-staffed teams, project services, resource pools, collaborative managed services

Pragmatic

Pragmatic, co-staffed approach well suited to building internal competency while getting key project initiatives completed

Flexible

Flexible engagement model

Alternative

Strong Alternative to the Global Consultancies
